segments.text: I see the girl standing near the boy, looking up at him with such trust.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to believe in him completely, and it's quite touching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her arm raised, palm open, eagerly waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's being quite patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of warmth, seeing the bond between the siblings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, determined to get what he wants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks focused, but also a bit reckless, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, still unaware of the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be deep in thought to miss all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that she's not paying attention to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around in time to see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she does, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
